project.name: |-- 001-basic-collections
project.description:
Keywords: + Collections + Iterator + Map + Collection Conversion + Comparator + Comparable
This project includes very simple examples involving Collections.
CollectionsIteratorRunner: Demonstrates how to iterate a Collection using an iterator.
CollectionsConversionRunner: Demonstrates how to convert a Set to a List.
MapRunner: Demonstrates the keySet, values and entrySet methods of a Map.
ComparatorAndComparableTestRunner: Demonstrates how to create a domain class that implements Comparable, and how to create Comparator instances to compare that domain object with different criteria.
